Authors:
Takashi Shirouzu, Muneyuki Ohmae, Shigeki Inaba, Yukako
Hattori
Title:
Auricularia americana s. str. (Auriculariales), newly
recorded from Japan
Abstract:
Fruiting-bodies of Auricularia were collected from Abies
spp. and identified as A. americana s. str. by molecular phylo- genetic
analysis and morphological comparison. This is the first report of A.
americana s. str. from Japan.
